comments.author: Chocolatelf
comments.content: A toast to an interesting vegetarian blog! It's been bookmarked. :) Love the breakfast, it's such a healthy start for a day!

comments.author: tijen
comments.content:
Michael,
I look at the foods on your blog and keep saying, how similar our foods are! I hope to visit Israel one day and see them with my own eyes.
